modName: Follower Presets and Bodyslides by Gman749
descriptionHtml:
Got requests for it, now here it is :) presets for all Followers released so far, nifs included. (RaceMenu required)

Also my current bodyslide presets for both UUNP and CBBE. 
Hope you like T&A if you decide to use them ;)

Note: I used a different set of tintmasks so if theres makeup in odd places,  adjust accordingly. Also the makeup mods REQUIRE the SKSE patch for 2048 resolution. 

If you want the girls to look like the pics here are the mods needed:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hair Renewal by Kalilies and Stealthic [/url]﻿

True Brows

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]Eyes of Beauty by LogRaam [/url]﻿

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74948]Linds Elven Eyes by Lind001[/url]﻿

[url=https://yevvieart.com/workshop/modding/yevmods-files/]YMMP Makeup by Yevvie[/url]﻿

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72955]Kais Makeup and Warpaints by XarathosHawke[/url]


[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50302/]Better Females Eyebrows- Standalone by BellaGail and Kalilies [/url]﻿

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411?tab=files]Brows by Hvelgimir[/url]﻿

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/]Mikan Eyes by nerune2525[/url]﻿

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34539/]Battle Hardened Warpaints by Diethardt[/url]﻿

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61332]Empyrean Warpaints by empyrean42[/url]﻿

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/]Freckle Mania by tetrodoxin[/url]

For the skin textures:

Diffuse

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91953]Bijin Skin by rxkx22 [/url]﻿

Normals

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13377/?tab=description]Sporty Sexy Map by xs2reality [/url]﻿

Subsurface and specular maps

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85649]RwoS textures by Gearhog
[/url]

Thanks to all the excellent mod Authors of Skyrim Nexus, the incredible talent in the Image Gallery and especially,  my friends at the Art Fletcher Discord server who helped assist me with troubleshooting :) love you guys!
author: Gman749
